name: Bounters Alpha 1
description:
Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game. You can host your server and play with your friends or you can join on other public server or you can play alone. Also, level editor is also planned (it is almost ready, but it needs bit more feature to release it).
The roadmap is here, although it is made for me to check what to do, so it might not be detailed. https://trello.com/b/N3nmHgak/bounters-unity-fps

(This game is in alpha, and almost everything is WIP. Please understand some bugs. Thank you.)

CONTROLS
  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Space bar - Jump
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left click - Shoot
  • F - Interact
  • 1, 2 - Change to primary/sidearm weapon
  • Tab - Inventory

You can change the keybind in settings.

HOW TO PLAY

Type the server's IP address and port to join the server. After you login, type username and password to make an account on the server. After you disconnect/logout from the server, use the same username and password.

The objective is to get the opponents' bounties by beating them up, interact their bodies to claim the bounty and extract from the area. There are few exit panels you can extract and it will take 5 seconds to extract. Also, there are some AIs roaming around the area and you just need to beat them up and get the bounty right away.

SERVER CONFIG

{
    "maxPlayers": 10,
    "maxAIs": 1,
    "AIspawnTime": 3.0,
    "port": 28475,
    "mapName": "Apartment"
}

SERVER COMMANDS

players - Shows a list of current online players.
ban - Ban a player by using a player number from the command 'player'.
unban - Unban a player by using banned IP.
banlist - Shows a list of banned players.
kick - Kick a player by using a player number from the command 'player'.
report - Check status of reports on the player.
reportlist- Shows a list of # reports on each players.
stop - Stops the server. (Important: Use this command to properly stop the server. Otherwise, player datas and ban list will not saved.)

INSTALLATION

Unzip Bounters_Client.zip file and execute Bounters.exe to start the game.

Unzip Bounters_Server.zip and execute Start Server.bat to host the server.
(If people cannot join your server, try port forwarding and reopen the server.)
